wikitext.*:
Very little is known of the '''Goodchild family''', other than that [[Bell Goodchild]] married [[Gaffer Gamgee|Hamfast Gamgee]] and was the mother of [[Samwise Gamgee]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref> They were perhaps of the working class.<ref>[[Robert Foster]], ''[[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]]'' p. 171</ref>
